page.description: Displays a picklist of scripts in dialog or toolbar format. Selected script is executed. Mode: 1= script_play_local(), 2=script_play(), 3= script_spwan()
page.syntax: Script_Name as C = ui_select_script([C script_list [,C title [,N rows [,N columns [,N mode ]]]]])

argument.name: Script_Name
argument.description: The name of the selected script.

argument.name: script_list
argument.description: Optional. Default = All scripts. A CR-LF delimited list of scripts.

argument.name: title
argument.description: Optional. The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: rows
argument.description: Optional. The number of rows visible in the list box.

argument.name: columns
argument.description: Optional. The width of the list box in characters.

page.discussion: The UI_SELECT_SCRIPT() function displays the Pick the script to play dialog box. The selected script is executed.
